title: 6 Simple Ways to Update Your Web Browser

steps.title: Open Google Chrome.
steps.content: Open Google Chrome. Google Chrome is available for Windows and Mac. [1] X Research source If needed, you can install Google Chrome .

steps.title: Click ⋮ in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Click ⋮ in the top-right corner. This will open a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Hover over Help, then click About Google Chrome.
steps.content: Hover over Help , then click About Google Chrome . A new window will open.

steps.title: Click Update Google Chrome.
steps.content: Click Update Google Chrome . Google Chrome will begin updating. This may take a few moments. After updating, you may need to restart before using Google Chrome . If you don't see Update Google Chrome , Google Chrome is up to date.

steps.title: Click the Apple menu icon.
steps.content: Click the Apple menu icon. This is the Apple icon in the top-left corner of the screen. [2] X Research source The most up-to-date version of Safari is included with the latest version of macOS. You'll need to update your Mac to update Safari.

steps.title: Click System Preferences.
steps.content: Click System Preferences . This will open a new window.

steps.title: Click Upgrade Now.
steps.content: Click Upgrade Now . Your Mac will begin updating. If there is no update available, you won't see the option to upgrade. To turn on automatic updates, check the box next to Automatically keep my Mac up to date . If needed, you can clear Safari history .

steps.title: Open Microsoft Edge.
steps.content: Open Microsoft Edge. Microsoft Edge is the default browser for Windows. [3] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Click ••• in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Click ••• in the top-right corner. This will open a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Hover over Help and feedback and click About Microsoft Edge.
steps.content: Hover over Help and feedback and click About Microsoft Edge . The Settings page will open.

steps.title: Click Download and install.
steps.content: Click Download and install . This will begin downloading the update. If you see Microsoft Edge is up to date , your browser is updated.

steps.title: Restart Microsoft Edge.
steps.content: Restart Microsoft Edge. To finish updating, you'll need to restart Microsoft Edge. You can do this manually or click Restart on the About page.

steps.title: Open Mozilla Firefox.
steps.content: Open Mozilla Firefox. Mozilla Firefox is available for Windows and Mac. [4] X Research source If needed, you can install Firefox .

steps.title: Click ☰ in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Click ☰ in the top-right corner. This will open a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Help, then About Firefox.
steps.content: Click Help , then About Firefox . This will be on the very bottom of the menu. Firefox will automatically check and install updates.

steps.title: Click Restart to Update Firefox.
steps.content: Click Restart to Update Firefox . If you don't see this option, Firefox is up to date. Firefox will restart to finish the update.

steps.title: Open the App Store .
steps.content: Open the App Store . If you use a browser's mobile app, you'll need to update through the App Store. Many browsers have mobile apps, such as: Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, and more. If you want to update Safari on iOS , you'll need to update your iOS version. Go to Settings → General → Software Update . If you don't see any updates, your Safari is up to date.

steps.title: Locate the app page for your mobile browser.
steps.content: Locate the app page for your mobile browser. You can search directly for the app by using the Search tab on the bottom-right corner. You can also tap your profile picture in the top-right corner and tap Purchased to scroll through a list of installed apps.

steps.title: Tap Update.
steps.content: Tap Update . This is a blue button underneath the app name. The app will begin installing the update. If you see Open instead of Update , your browser app is up to date.

steps.title: Open the Google Play Store .
steps.content: Open the Google Play Store . If you use a browser's mobile app, you'll need to update through the Google Play Store. Many browsers have mobile apps, such as: Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, and more. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Locate the app page for your mobile browser.
steps.content: Locate the app page for your mobile browser. You can search directly for the app by using the search bar at the very top of the screen. You can also tap your profile picture in the top-right and tap Manage apps and devices to scroll through a list of installed apps.

steps.title: Tap Update.
steps.content: Tap Update . This is a green button below the app name. The app will begin installing the update. If you see Open instead of Update , your browser app is up to date.
